section.title: Toolbox.Core.Options.ApiRequest Class Reference

para.para: Represents an HTTP API request.

Adds a header to the request.
Adds a query parameter to the request.
Sets a custom timeout for this request.

Creates a POST request with JSON content.
static ApiRequest Put< T > (string url, T body, JsonSerializerOptions? options=null)
Creates a PUT request with JSON content.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Represents an HTTP API request.
This class encapsulates all the data needed to make an HTTP request, including URL, method, headers, and body content.
